item.title: CVE-2024-30508|2024-03-29T14:17:20.834Z -- ThimPress -- WP Hotel Booking
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in ThimPress WP Hotel Booking.This issue affects WP Hotel Booking: from n/a through 2.0.9.2.
